I'm a data analyst and researcher with **10 years of experience** transforming complex research data into actionable business insights. I specialize in market research, survey design, and statistical analysis with a proven track record of leading projects that drive strategic decision-making.

With expertise in both **quantitative and qualitative research methods**, I help organizations understand their markets, customers, and opportunities. My work combines rigorous statistical analysis with clear storytelling to deliver insights that matter.
